languages.text: "По законам Простора платой за спасение Леди-Навигатора стал контракт, обязывающий ее служить на моем корабле".

traits.locale_text: "По законам Коронуса платой за спасение Леди-Навигатора стал контракт, обязывающий ее служить на моем корабле".

languages.text: "Under the Expanse law, the payment for rescuing the Lady Navigator was a contract obliging her to serve on my ship."
languages.original_text: "По законам Простора платой за спасение Леди-Навигатора стал контракт, обязывающий ее служить на моем корабле".

traits.locale_text: "Under the laws of Koronus, the payment for rescuing Lady Navigator was a verbal contract obliging her to serve on my ship for another six hundred turns."
"Under the laws of Koronus, the payment for rescuing Lady Navigator was a verbal contract obliging her to serve on my ship for another six hundred turns."
"Under Koronus law, the payment for rescuing the Lady Navigator was a verbal contract obliging her to serve on my ship for another six hundred turns."
"Under Koronus law, the payment for rescuing the Lady Navigator was a verbal contract obliging her to serve on my ship for another six hundred turns."
"Under Koronus law, the payment for rescuing the Lady Navigator was a contract obliging her to serve on my ship."
"Under the Expanse law, the payment for rescuing the Lady Navigator was a contract obliging her to serve on my ship."

languages.text: “根据科罗努斯扩区的律法，我解救导航者女士的报酬是一份合约。她有义务在我的船上服务。”
languages.original_text: "Under the Expanse law, the payment for rescuing the Lady Navigator was a contract obliging her to serve on my ship."

traits.locale_text: “根据科罗努斯扩区的律法，我解救导航者女士的报酬是一份合约。她有义务在我的船上服务。”

languages.text: «Conforme a las leyes de la Extensión, el pago por rescatar a la lady Navegante era un contrato que la obliga a servir en mi nave».
languages.original_text: "Under the Expanse law, the payment for rescuing the Lady Navigator was a contract obliging her to serve on my ship."

traits.locale_text: «Conforme a las leyes de la Extensión, el pago por rescatar a la lady Navegante era un contrato que la obliga a servir en mi nave».

languages.text: 「エクスパンスの法では、航宙士殿を救出した代金は、私の船で働くことを義務付ける契約だったはずだ」
languages.original_text: "Under the Expanse law, the payment for rescuing the Lady Navigator was a contract obliging her to serve on my ship."

traits.locale_text: 「エクスパンスの法では、航宙士殿を救出した代金は、私の船で働くことを義務付ける契約だったはずだ」

languages.text: "Gemäß den Gesetzen der Ausdehnung bestand die Bezahlung für die Rettung des Lady Navigators in einem Vertrag, der sie zum Dienst auf meinem Schiff verpflichtet."
languages.original_text: "Under the Expanse law, the payment for rescuing the Lady Navigator was a contract obliging her to serve on my ship."

traits.locale_text: "Gemäß den Gesetzen der Ausdehnung bestand die Bezahlung für die Rettung des Lady Navigators in einem Vertrag, der sie zum Dienst auf meinem Schiff verpflichtet."

languages.text: « Conformément à la loi des Étendues, la dame navigatrice et moi-même sommes {mf|liés|liées} par un contrat depuis que je l'ai secourue. Elle sert à bord de mon navire. »
languages.original_text: "Under the Expanse law, the payment for rescuing the Lady Navigator was a contract obliging her to serve on my ship."

traits.locale_text: « Conformément à la loi des Étendues, la dame navigatrice et moi-même sommes {mf|liés|liées} par un contrat depuis que je l'ai secourue. Elle sert à bord de mon navire. »

languages.text: "Enginlik kanunlarınca Leydi Rotacı'yı kurtarmamın karşılığında, ona gemimde hizmet etme yükümlülüğü yükleyen bir kontrat imzalandı."
languages.original_text: "Under the Expanse law, the payment for rescuing the Lady Navigator was a contract obliging her to serve on my ship."

traits.locale_text: "Enginlik kanunlarınca Leydi Rotacı'yı kurtarmamın karşılığında, ona gemimde hizmet etme yükümlülüğü yükleyen bir kontrat imzalandı."
